app.name: Requestly
app.one_liner: A local-first API client and HTTP interceptor with testing, mocking, and collaboration features.

screens.name: API Client Workspace
screens.purpose: Primary interface for creating, editing, and running API requests with support for environments, collections, and scripting.

rust_commands.name: save_item
rust_commands.purpose: Persist an API request or collection to local disk within the current workspace.

rust_commands.name: run_request
rust_commands.purpose: Execute an API request with pre-request and post-response script support.

mvp_plan: week 1: Implement local workspace creation and file-based storage
week 1: Build basic request editor with method, URL, headers, body
week 1: Add run button with simple fetch execution
week 1: Support importing cURL commands into request fields
acceptance_tests: User can paste a cURL command into the URL bar and have all request fields auto-populated.
User can save a request to a local workspace directory and reopen it later.
User can switch between multiple local workspaces without losing state.
rq.iterationData.get() correctly retrieves JSON data during Runner execution.
